name: Magic Piano Kit
description:
Teach your little one to learn how to find music keys and play piano?

Language and music are two important skills to be mastered.

Choose different instrument's sounds to play and different songs.

This game is suitable for toddler, preschooler, kindergarten, and young children (first grader, second grader or younger). Interactive, engaging, and fun, easy piano lessons designed to help your little one learning about keys.
